name: Shoot8
description:
This game was made with Pico-8 following this tutorial series during Fun Week in Mutate!

Feel free to check out Mutate if you want to easily make your own voxel games :)

(sound might not be so good in the browser,  download the .exe)
FEATURES!
  • 2 (THAT'S TWO!!!) power ups.
    • Triple Shot.
    • Increase Firing Rate.
  • ONE enemy! Brutal.
  • Cold cameraman (he shakes sometimes)
  • Some music I improvised to get it done.
  • BUGS!!!
